PagedQueryResponse.description: A base response containing page data for a request

pageNumber.description: The current page number of the selected data

pageSize.description: The size of the current page

recordsTotal.description: The total number of records in the data set

recordsFiltered.description: The number of records filtered from the data set

PagedQueryResponse.title: PagedQueryResponse

ProblemDetailsResponse.description: A model for API errors inline with the [RFC 7807](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7807) specification.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3986) that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provide human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7807#ref-W3C.REC-html5-20141028)). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be `about:blank`.

title.default: An error occurred processing your request.
title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It **SHOULD NOT** change from occurrence to occurrence of the pro**blem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see [RFC7231, Section 3.4](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7231#section-3.4)).
title.example: You do not have enough credit.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Your current balance is 30, but that costs 50.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ProblemDetailsResponse.title: ProblemDetailsResponse

Sample Response.title: An error occurred processing your request.
Sample Response.detail: Your current balance is 30, but that costs 50.

CommandSuccessResponse.description: A response returned from the server when data is successfully updated
CommandSuccessResponse.title: CommandSuccessResponse

RecordBase.description: The minimum model fields shared by all data stored in the database
RecordBase.title: RecordBase

Address.title: Address

email.description: The email address of the contact
